incidents.title: SSL Certificate expiration
incidents.content: SSL Certificate have expired and cause errors on media-req platform.

incidents.title: Rack maintenance
incidents.content: Rack is being recabled and have wheels, which needs a complete shutdown to do so.

incidents.title: Collect router failure
incidents.content: Hardware failure on collect router caused major network outage on all infrastructure.

incidents.title: Electrical failure
incidents.content: A power outage caused most servers to go down, then broke the measurement tool, causing the rest of the servers (on UPS) to also shutdown.

incidents.title: Storage upgrade
incidents.content: Storage server is upgraded to a more recent and performant one, causing downtime for Plex and Media Factory.
